detail_desc: Fleece duffle coat with a detachable, pile-lined hood, patch front pockets, toggles at the front and a yoke at the back. Pile lining.
Jacket in soft pile with a lined hood, zip down the front and front pockets. Lined.
Cap-sleeved top in softly draping jersey with a double-layered stand-up collar that has gathers at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.

Shirt in a premium cotton weave with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a lined hood in a contrasting colour. Buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Satin top with an opening front and back and button at the back of the neck. Short, flounce-trimmed sleeves and a seam at the hem with a double layer of flounces.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Long-sleeved, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Tape-trimmed V-neck front and back.
Hat in fast-drying functional fabric made partly from recycled polyester.
Leggings in jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.

Shirt in soft, brushed cotton twill with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Two flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in soft viscose jersey with a smocked waist and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft brushed twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.

Set with a jacket and pair of trousers in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and jersey trims at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and jersey trims at the hems. The polyester content of the set is partly recycled.
Trousers in heavy jersey with a high waist, pleats at the top and a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener. Diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Satin-covered Alice band with decorative braiding.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit premium cotton with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Playsuit in a crêpe weave with a button at the back of the neck and an opening at the back ending with a hook-and-eye fastening and concealed zip. Tie belt at the waist, side pockets, short sleeves and short legs.
Short dress in an airy jacquard weave with a V-neck and covered buttons down the front. Short puff sleeves, a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Lined.
Trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details. Lightly padded cups with removable inserts, wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide, elasticated hem. Light support.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a grosgrain trim around the opening and a decorative bow at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Top in ribbed jersey with overlocked edges and long sleeves with a double flounce at the cuffs.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in patterned cotton jersey. Sleeveless top with a straight-cut neckline, frill-trimmed shoulder straps and a rounded hem. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist and frill-trimmed hems.

Sleeveless dress in tulle with a bodice covered in shimmering sequins and beads. Narrow shoulder straps, a zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a skirt in several layers of flounces to create volume. Lined.

Boxy jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a boat neck and buttons on one shoulder. Low dropped shoulders, decorative buttons down one sleeve and ribbing around the neckline, down the sleeves and at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Tailored shorts in an airy weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake back pocket.
Lined bikini top with flounce-trimmed, adjustable shoulder straps and underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Iron-on patches to patch and repair garments. The patches are made from fabric left over from denim production. Size 11x14 cm.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, diagonal zip at the front and side pockets. Ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Shorts in an airy weave. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with covered elastication, a zip fly and buttons, and flap leg pockets.
T-shirt in airy, softly draping Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a ribbed neckline.

Jacquard-knit jumper and a pair of jacquard-knit trousers in soft cotton. Jumper with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Vest top in patterned cotton jersey with deep armholes.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood, print motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Soft slippers in imitation suede with elastication around the opening and a loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles,and soft soles in imitation leather with anti-slip protectors.

Non-wired nursing bra in soft microfibre with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Chinos in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket.
Straight-cut jacket in a striped cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, jetted front pockets and long sleeves with a tab and button. No fasteners. Unlined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Dress knitted in a cotton blend containing some wool with a pattern knit at the top and long sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with a lace trim at the hem.
Jersey cycling shorts with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in a checked cotton weave with a collar, press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Embroidered text at the top and at the back, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a gently rounded hem.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle and adjustable, padded shoulder straps. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and a mesh compartment at one side. Padded laptop sleeve, a zipped inner compartment and a padded back plate and base. Lined. Size 12x28x44 cm.

Single-breasted marled jacket in an Italian wool weave with a lightly brushed finish. Narrow notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole, two buttons at the front, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Suede elbow patches, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette. For matching trousers, search on 0518647.

Long-sleeved dress in heavy jersey. V-shaped yoke at the front with a flounced trim that continues around the dropped shoulders. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. The cotton content of the dress is organic.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, wrapover bodice with a concealed press-stud at the top and narrow shoulder straps, one with a flounced trim. Elasticated seam and ties at the waist and an asymmetric, wrapover skirt with a flounce at the front. Unlined.
Bolero in fine-knit cotton with a faceted, heart-shaped button and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in a linen and cotton weave with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the top and concealed press-studs at the crotch (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and hems.
Sports trousers in sturdy, fast-drying jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a leg pocket with a taped zip. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a boat neck, gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy, and a gently rounded hem.

Sandals with braided jute trims around the soles, a foot strap with a decorative bow and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings, fabric insoles and patterned soles.

Balconette bra in lace with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape, double, adjustable shoulder straps that join at the front, elastic straps at the sides and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Trousers in lightweight, patterned cotton sweatshirt fabric with elastication and belt loops at the waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit modal blend containing some wool with roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas with a top and leggings. Oversized top in soft, patterned pile with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Pyjamas with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Shirt with a small flock print on the chest, a rounded collar with contrasting colour piping and buttons down the front. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Leggings in stretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Elasticated waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Lightly padded gilet in water-repellent, windproof functional fabric with a small stand-up collar and taped zip down the front. Side pockets with a taped zip, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined. Polyester filling.

Long dress in an airy weave with a sweetheart neckline, wrapover, draped wrapover bodice with a concealed silicone trim at the top and boning. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back, a seam under the bust and a long, wide skirt. Satin lining.
Padded coat in a quilted weave with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with a soft faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and side pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Fully lined swimsuit with a flounce at the top that continues over the shoulders, and shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Faux fur gilet with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and pockets in the side seams. Satin lining.
Fully lined printed bikini. Triangle top with adjustable ties at the back of the neck, a plastic fastener at the back and sewn-on metal decoration on one shoulder strap.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Sleeveless top in woven viscose fabric with jacquard-weave stripes in a narrow cut at the top with a collar and ties, and short slits in the sides.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and long sleeves. Open chest pocket and a straight-cut hem.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with a double layer at the top and long sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in patterned slub cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frills at the top, a gathered seam and flared skirt. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.

Straight-cut tunic in a softly draping, crinkled viscose weave. Opening with narrow ties at the top and a gathered yoke. Narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist and long balloon sleeves with a seam at the top and narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Dungarees in sweatshirt fabric made from soft organic cotton. Straps with press-studs, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping jersey. High waist with concealed elastication and a wide seam centre front to create a draped effect. Unlined.
